transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan, hello.
Customer: Pata nahi sir call disconnect ho rahi hai automatic. Ji.
Executive: Haan, mere khyal se total kitna, kitna deduction karoge sir isme se?
Executive: Sir aapka 31533 rupaye aapko wapas mil raha hai. Hai na? To ye kitna ho gaya? Ye to 1500 bhi nahi hai sir. Kitna hai ye? Ek second.

Executive: Haan, aapka 1507 rupaye hai sir.
Customer: Sir kaise? Maine to 35000 kuch rupaye ka wo kiya hai.
Executive: 35040 rupaye diye the aapne. 35040.
Customer: Yes.
Executive: Haan. 35040 diye the jisme aapko 31533 rupaye mil rahe hain. Yani ki 1507 rupaye deduct hua hai sir.
Customer: Month ek, one month ka.
Executive: Haan sir.
Customer: One month ka hua na? Ye total thodi na hai.
Executive: Nahi ye one month ka bhi nahi hua. Ye kitna hua hai?
Executive: Aap kab onboard hue the IndiaMART pe?
Customer: Main hua tha shayad 10 August ko.
Executive: August ko. To ye chal raha hai sir November.
Customer: Yes.
Executive: To ye lagbhag lagbhag kitna ho gaya? Aapka August ke baad September, October aur ye November chal raha hai. To lagbhag lagbhag teen mahine ho gaye hain sir. Aapka to balki amount kam deduct hua hai sir.
Customer: Do mahine hue hain sir pure pure. Ya to August mein hua hai ya September mein hua hai. Mere ko exact nahi hai but hua do month hai. Main ek bar check kar leta hu.
Executive: Haan to do mahine. Haan ye 3 September ko aapka maturity hui thi to 8 ya 9 tarikh ko aapka host hua tha.
Customer: Haan to September ko September ko hua sir. September se October, October se November lagbhag lagbhag do mahine hue hain sir.
Executive: Haan.
Executive: To almost almost agar main dekhunga na sir do mahine aapka service agar for example chala hai to 35040 rupaye ke hisab se lagbhag lagbhag 3000 rupaye ke aas pass ban raha hai aapka mahine ka.
Customer: Do mahine ka lagbhag 5500 6000 katna chahiye tha. Aapka 1500 hi kata hai sir.
Customer: But ab main aapko bata raha hu na ye bhi jyada kata hai na. Agar kahin na kahin kuch mujhe benefit hota to main tere ko bol deta. Koi baat nahi aap 6000 kat lo.
Executive: Sir main ye keh raha hu ki agar wo baat hoti to fir to ye naubat hi nahi aati na sir. Hmm.
Executive: Aap to fir ke liye thodi ja rahe ho. Aap to aage services ko upgrade karate ya aap aage dekhte ki aur kya karna hai.
Customer: Sir mera mera jo main reason banaya hai wo mera main reason banaya hai.
Executive: Main to sir aapko abhi bhi keh raha hu agar aap dekhiye sir aapka expectation jo hai wo jyada tha. Aapne kyuki main sir dekhiye kisi bhi business mein na koi bhi guarantee nahi de sakta hai sir ki aapko ek mahine mein do mahine mein char mahine mein kitne mahine mein business milega. Business develop karna sir wo hamare hath mein nahi hai na aapke hath mein hai sir. Hum dono ko milke karne se kam hota hai.
Customer: But sir main to yahi kahunga. Main to yahi kahunga aap jo hai amount thoda jyada deduct kar rahe ho to isko kam kariye. Please.
Executive: Sir dekhiye ab yahan se maine isko already maine aapko bola tha sir ki aapke pass koi return communication hai to bataiye. Aapke pass koi return communication nahi tha sir. Uske baad bhi maine isko aage process karwaya hai. Thik hai?
Executive: Aur ab kyuki sir dekhiye main to aapko bol sakta tha sir ki ye nahi ho sakta. Ideally to ye nahi hona chahiye tha sir. Hmm. Thik hai sir. Ab mujhe aap bataiye sir ki isko ko mere ko aage karna hai ya nahi karna hai kyuki aap isme agar aage koi ye amount jo hai ye kam hi hone wala hai sir jyada nahi hoga.
Customer: [inaudible] matlab aur kam karne ki soch rahe ho badhane ki nahi soch sakte ho sir.
Executive: Sir main wahi keh raha hu aapka ideally ab mere ko to
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer states call is disconnecting automatically.

- Customer believes the deduction amount is too high.



Resolution:

- Executive clarified the deducted amount is for two months.

- Executive explained the amount is less than expected.



Next Steps: 

- Executive asked if customer wants to continue services.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- deduction, refund, subscription, amount
